name: Shiba Watch
description: Shiba Watch is a multi-functional coin listing platform that aims to have an NFT marketplace, staking/lending platform, P2E games and a DEX. Investors can use the platform to safely find their next token to invest. $SHIBAW tokens will be used for promotions on the Shiba Watch platform and discounts during transactions for NFT marketplace and other functions. Holding $SHIBAW tokens will passively reward users with BUSD rewards.
